p2p_service_hostname.description: DNS name of the P2P NLB (if enabled)

rpc_service_hostname.description: DNS name of the RPC internal NLB (if enabled)

dockerconfigjson.description: Optional Docker Hub pull secret in .dockerconfigjson format (base64 NOT required). If empty, no imagePullSecret is created.

enable_internal_rpc.description: Whether to expose RPC port via an internal NLB

enable_public_p2p.description: Whether to expose P2P port via an internet-facing NLB

node_instance_types.description: Instance types for the managed node group

pvc_size.description: PVC size for each Energi replica

rpc_allowed_cidrs.description: CIDR blocks allowed to access the RPC NLB (if enabled). Keep restrictive.
